Name: Building Knowledge Graphs with OpenSearch
Description: Deep dive into implementing graph database capabilities using OpenSearch and distributed systems. Covers real-time indexing patterns and query optimization strategies for billion-scale graphs.

Name: Real-time Analytics at Scale: Lessons from Meta
Description: Architecture patterns for processing 50M+ events per second. Discusses stream processing with Kafka and real-time aggregation techniques used in production.

Name: GraphQL Federation Best Practices
Description: Guide to implementing federated GraphQL architectures for microservices. Includes performance optimization and caching strategies.

Name: TensorFlow Pipelines for Production ML
Description: Building production-grade ML pipelines using TensorFlow and Kubeflow. Covers automated testing and model deployment patterns.

Name: Microservices Architecture for Enterprise Scale
Description: Designing microservices that serve 500K+ enterprise customers. Database optimization and service mesh patterns.

Name: iOS Framework Development: App Store at Scale
Description: Building SDKs and frameworks for the App Store infrastructure. Performance optimization techniques for millions of developers.

Name: Machine Learning for Content Recommendation
Description: A/B testing frameworks for personalization at Netflix scale. Covers recommendation algorithms and real-time experimentation.

Name: Introduction to Distributed Systems
Description: Fundamentals of distributed computing and networking protocols. Educational guide for building scalable systems.
